Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: This was fixed in the release-1.4 branch, unfortunately its not something that can be fixed in an already cut release. The location of manifest-tool changed. We do however no longer use the manifest tool, so you can simply remove it's references in `gotool.mk` like I did here: https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/commit/2dbf8d683213b20d67c24b97f32c9496c3439711#diff-f1801680e04e8da6310d52c5825bc0dab677eb795822b246e1f53b8fd6ed8fcdL6

Action.author: JIRAUSER21089
Action.body: Thanks.It is working with release-1.4 branch.
